user_query: I'm starting a new business and I need to convert 2000 Canadian Dollars to US Dollars. Can you provide me with the current exchange rate and the converted amount? Additionally, can you recommend some reliable shipping companies to deliver my products internationally?

TaskList.description: Fetch the current exchange rate from Canadian Dollars to US Dollars.
Convert 2000 Canadian Dollars to US Dollars using the exchange rate obtained from Task 1.
Research and recommend reliable shipping companies for international delivery.
